info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia, southeastern Albany and southwestern Rensselaer Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Castleton-On-Hudson, or near East Greenbush, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Greenbush, Nassau, Castleton-On-Hudson, Selkirk, East Nassau, East Schodack, Brookview, Van Hoesen Station, South Albany, Jacks Corners, Selkirk Yards, Spawn Hollow, Hoag Corners, Callanans Corners, Beckers Corners, Rayville, Malden Bridge, Riders Mills, East Greenbush Station and Bethlehem Heights. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near exit 10. Interstate 87 between exits 21A and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
